name: Boarder Control: An RNG Strategy Game
name_original: Boarder Control: An RNG Strategy Game
description:
Boarder Control is an turn-based RNG Strategy board game made for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam: "Out of Control". 

The goal is to strategically capture every enemy piece with your own different pieces. The twist is that the rules of the game are not in your control. Each turn, the rules change. These rules may alter the possible moves of pieces (distance, type, rotation), their positions, or even cast certain effects on them.

These changes are shown to you beforehand. Therefore the goal of the game is to try to adapt to the ever-changing ruleset and strategize ahead of time to complete the 10 available levels.

All the art, code, and audio were made during the 48 hour period of the jam.

Unfortunately, due to a bug that I had no control over - and that I discovered too late -, which made the game IMPOSSIBLE to play, I had to remove it from the jam in question. This version is still the Jam version, just with that bug removed...
